FileFormat.FormatDescription: Alias is a Computer Aided Design software family owned by Autodesk. The Pix Image file is a raster image format produced produced by Alias. Files of this type may lack a file extension.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Canadian Centre for Architecture / The Canadian Centre for Architecture

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF, offset 4: 0x0000 (representing offset to x coordinates from end of 10 byte header), {2}, 0x0018 representing 24 bits per pixel, [!00] representing number of contiguous bytes (greater than 0) that contain the following 3 byte RGB value - https://www.autodesk.com/techpubs/aliasstudio/2010/index.html?url=WS73099cc142f4875535a241551166ac8792f-7d76.htm,topicNumber=d0e246178
